summary: Can you fuckin imagine what it would be like if aggretsuko happened in real life like
title: Can you fuckin imagine what it would be like if aggretsuko happened in real life like
body:
You watch your normally sweet, calm coworker casually walk to the bathroom, then hear death metal singing about you? Like what would you do??

“what the Fuck is david doing Screamo?? at work? The whole office can clearly hear you, the bathroom is right there” 

There would be HR complaints “He talked about killing us in so many different ways!”

reblog.comment:
You watch your normally sweet, calm coworker casually walk to the bathroom, then hear death metal singing about you? Like what would you do??

“what the Fuck is david doing Screamo?? at work? The whole office can clearly hear you, the bathroom is right there” 

There would be HR complaints “He talked about killing us in so many different ways!”

trail.content_raw:
You watch your normally sweet, calm coworker casually walk to the bathroom, then hear death metal singing about you? Like what would you do??

There would be HR complaints “He talked about killing us in so many different ways!”

summary: Passion Week Moderator Pick: Kyuu [Instagram | Tumblr] Kyuu’s pick: Retsuko from Aggretsuko and her secret love for singing...
caption:
Passion Week Moderator Pick: Kyuu [Instagram | Tumblr]

Kyuu’s pick: Retsuko from Aggretsuko and her secret love for singing Death Metal

“I think Aggretsuko’s secret love of singing death metal karaoke is the best thing I’ve ever seen 🖤✨  What a way to destress 😂 (I also love how that she finds friends that are 100% supportive of this hobby)” —Kyuu

summary: The Wedding Part 4: The Game Plan
title: The Wedding Part 4: The Game Plan
body:
*Fenneko and Tsunoda is touring the families around the venue*

Fenneko: Okay, so now we’ve reached the main room itself. This is basically where all the magic happens.

Hisoka: It’s pretty big!

Fenneko: PLEASE. When I was looking for a good venue, there were tons bigger. Even a megachurch! …buuuut that’s in South Korea, and I ain’t paying for plane tickets. This ended up doing the job.

Tsunoda: If you ask me, I could’ve done much better if I was in charge of all the operations!

Fenneko: Your initial plan called for the whole wedding to be moved to Aruba.

Tsunoda: It’s lovely this time of year!

Fenneko: Well, in any case, this is our base of operations, whether you all like it or not.

Rie: I think we like it, thank you. ^^

Fenneko: Awesome. So, once the wedding goes off, we’ll start having the reception. Lucky us, this place allows for both, so we can party almost immediately. Also, this is nothing necessarily noteworthy, it’s just an aesthetic thing, but there are a bunch of cherry blossom trees around here, and the owners informed me they’re start blooming big come the wedding day. So it’ll be extra purdy around here.

Tsunoda: …oh. Kinda wished you told me, before I started criticizing this place.

Fenneko: Shoulda been paying attention.

Ryota: Ah, it’s nice to hear that news. Nothing brings to mind a classic Japanese wedding quite like the sight of cherry blossoms!

Ryuu: …yeah…

Fenneko: …*turns to Ryuu* You alright, muh dude?

Ryuu: Hmm? Um….yes.

Fenneko: …alright. I trust you.

Ryuu: Good to know, I guess.

Rie: You have to understand, he has some…reservations about the wedding.

Fenneko: Ah, gotcha. A little scared about your sis getting married?

Ryuu: …not really scared, necessarily.

Fenneko: …huh. Aight. So, um, yeah. That’s basically the basic idea. We’ll probably start rehearsing proper within the next few days. Until then, just kinda…hang out, I guess.

Ryota: Actually, where is Retsuko? Or Haida, for that matter?

Fenneko: They’re testing out wedding attire, for photos and stuff.

Rie: Can we go see them?

Tsunoda: Well, wait! What about the rest of the tour? I got stuff for the siblings!

Hiroko: …erm, does that include me, or just the twins?

Tsunoda: Both.

Fenneko: Tell ya what, I’ll just take the parents for a few minutes, to go see the lovebirds. We’ll be right back.

Tsunoda: Well, alright.

Ryota: Riko, keep an eye on your brother.

Riko: Yes, sir!

Hiroko: Ah, don’t worry! With me, he won’t be able to do much.

Ryuu: Murgh…

Fenneko: ….*to Tsunoda* lemme know if he acts up at all.

Tsunoda: Got it.

Fenneko: *to the parents* C’mon, let’s go. *they head out*

*a short while later, at a dressing room, in a clothing store nearby*

Retsuko: *getting dressed, with Haida and Ikari waiting outside* Good god, must these things always be so tight?!

Haida: Sorry, sweetie! You need help?

Retsuko: No, I think I got it.

Haida: You sure?

Retsuko: ….actually, I’m not sure.

Haida: Ah, alright. Lemme help. *gets up, and turns to see Fenneko with company* Oh! Hey, Fenneko! Hi, mom! Hi, dad!

Ryota: Heh, what, no hellos for us?

Retsuko: Oh, no, I’m not ready! Ugh, hang on!

Rie: …is she trying on a wedding dress?

Haida: Yyyyep.

Rie: *sigh* Hang on, sweetheart. Let me in. *Retsuko unlocks the door, and Rie sneaks in* …oh, you just have one last notch! Hang on….there! Ready, everyone?

Haida: Ready!

Ikari: Boh!

Retsuko: *sigh* Here goes. *they open the door, revealing Retsuko in a very lovely, pearly white dress, looking rather bashful*

Rie: *beaming with joy* What do you think, huh? :D

Haida: *his mouth agape: ………………..

Retsuko: …….Haida?

Fenneko: Yo, yeen boy. You alright?

Haida: ….*turns to Ryota* ..sir…..t-thank you so much! *to Rie* Thank you so much too! *bows to both*

Ryota: Uh…what for?

Haida: For allowing me to marry such an angel, of course! :’D

Retsuko: *face red like a tomato* H-Haida! >////<

Fenneko: Hahahaha, say whatever you will about Haida, he always knows how to get her flustered. :3

Retsuko: Hehehe! …hey, where are the others?

Fenneko: Tsunoda’s watching over Hiroko, Riko, and the ticking time-bomb.

Retsuko: Oh. How is Ryuu?

Ryota: Well, he seems to be calm right now. But I don’t know…

Retsuko: …well, maybe he just needs a little time to himself. Or maybe someone to chat with. We’ve all been a bit busy. *closes the door, to get undressed, and get back into her regular clothes*

Fenneko: My advice? Do it quickly, before he snaps on the big day. *her phone starts ringing* Ooh, Tsunoda! Gimme a sec, guys. *answers* Y’ello? ……………uh-huh…..uh-huh…….shit. Alright, hold him off for a few minutes. Alright, thanks. *hangs up* Okay, scratch that, your brother’s in meltdown mode right now.

Retsuko: *open the door, fully dressed in civilian attire* He’s WHAT?!

Fenneko: Yeah, he just started wrecking shit, apparently.

Rie: Oh, no! *they run out, to get going* Come on!

Haida: ….*quickly runs back to the cash register, with the wedding dress* this was paid for, right?

Cashier: Yes, sir, it was paid.

Haida: Wonderful.

Retsuko: HAIDA!

Haida: Coming! *runs out*

OHHHH, WE’RE HALFWAY THERE, WHOOOOOAAA, ….I CAN’T THINK OF A GOOD RHYME WITH THERE!

But yes, we are now OFFICIALLY at the halfway point! ….well, technically, we’re not, as there’s an epilo-actually, no, do NOT wanna jinx myself, ya know? I’m so sorry this has taken as long as it has, life has a weird way of kicking me in the balls when I least expect it. I don’t know when Part 5 will be, but I do know how it’ll go. So that’s a positive…..I think. :3

Haida: Ah, alright. Lemme help. *gets up, and turns to see Fenneko with company* Oh! Hey, Fenneko! Hi, mom! Hi, dad!

Ryota: Heh, what, no hellos for us?

Retsuko: Oh, no, I’m not ready! Ugh, hang on!

Rie: …is she trying on a wedding dress?

Haida: Yyyyep.

Rie: *sigh* Hang on, sweetheart. Let me in. *Retsuko unlocks the door, and Rie sneaks in* …oh, you just have one last notch! Hang on….there! Ready, everyone?

Haida: Ready!

Ikari: Boh!

Retsuko: *sigh* Here goes. *they open the door, revealing Retsuko in a very lovely, pearly white dress, looking rather bashful*

Rie: *beaming with joy* What do you think, huh? :D

Haida: *his mouth agape: ………………..

Retsuko: …….Haida?

Fenneko: Yo, yeen boy. You alright?

Haida: ….*turns to Ryota* ..sir…..t-thank you so much! *to Rie* Thank you so much too! *bows to both*

Ryota: Uh…what for?

Haida: For allowing me to marry such an angel, of course! :’D

Retsuko: *face red like a tomato* H-Haida! >////<

Fenneko: Hahahaha, say whatever you will about Haida, he always knows how to get her flustered. :3

Retsuko: Hehehe! …hey, where are the others?

Fenneko: Tsunoda’s watching over Hiroko, Riko, and the ticking time-bomb.

Retsuko: Oh. How is Ryuu?

Ryota: Well, he seems to be calm right now. But I don’t know…

Retsuko: …well, maybe he just needs a little time to himself. Or maybe someone to chat with. We’ve all been a bit busy. *closes the door, to get undressed, and get back into her regular clothes*

Fenneko: My advice? Do it quickly, before he snaps on the big day. *her phone starts ringing* Ooh, Tsunoda! Gimme a sec, guys. *answers* Y’ello? ……………uh-huh…..uh-huh…….shit. Alright, hold him off for a few minutes. Alright, thanks. *hangs up* Okay, scratch that, your brother’s in meltdown mode right now.

Retsuko: *open the door, fully dressed in civilian attire* He’s WHAT?!

Fenneko: Yeah, he just started wrecking shit, apparently.

Rie: Oh, no! *they run out, to get going* Come on!

Haida: ….*quickly runs back to the cash register, with the wedding dress* this was paid for, right?

Cashier: Yes, sir, it was paid.

Haida: Wonderful.

Retsuko: HAIDA!

Haida: Coming! *runs out*

OHHHH, WE’RE HALFWAY THERE, WHOOOOOAAA, ….I CAN’T THINK OF A GOOD RHYME WITH THERE!

But yes, we are now OFFICIALLY at the halfway point! ….well, technically, we’re not, as there’s an epilo-actually, no, do NOT wanna jinx myself, ya know? I’m so sorry this has taken as long as it has, life has a weird way of kicking me in the balls when I least expect it. I don’t know when Part 5 will be, but I do know how it’ll go. So that’s a positive…..I think. :3

trail.content_raw:
*Fenneko and Tsunoda is touring the families around the venue*

Fenneko: Okay, so now we’ve reached the main room itself. This is basically where all the magic happens.

Hisoka: It’s pretty big!

Fenneko: PLEASE. When I was looking for a good venue, there were tons bigger. Even a megachurch! …buuuut that’s in South Korea, and I ain’t paying for plane tickets. This ended up doing the job.

Tsunoda: If you ask me, I could’ve done much better if I was in charge of all the operations!

Fenneko: Your initial plan called for the whole wedding to be moved to Aruba.

Tsunoda: It’s lovely this time of year!

Fenneko: Well, in any case, this is our base of operations, whether you all like it or not.

Rie: I think we like it, thank you. ^^

Fenneko: Awesome. So, once the wedding goes off, we’ll start having the reception. Lucky us, this place allows for both, so we can party almost immediately. Also, this is nothing necessarily noteworthy, it’s just an aesthetic thing, but there are a bunch of cherry blossom trees around here, and the owners informed me they’re start blooming big come the wedding day. So it’ll be extra purdy around here.

Tsunoda: …oh. Kinda wished you told me, before I started criticizing this place.

Fenneko: Shoulda been paying attention.

Ryota: Ah, it’s nice to hear that news. Nothing brings to mind a classic Japanese wedding quite like the sight of cherry blossoms!

Ryuu: …yeah…

Fenneko: …*turns to Ryuu* You alright, muh dude?

Ryuu: Hmm? Um….yes.

Fenneko: …alright. I trust you.

Ryuu: Good to know, I guess.

Rie: You have to understand, he has some…reservations about the wedding.

Fenneko: Ah, gotcha. A little scared about your sis getting married?

Ryuu: …not really scared, necessarily.

Fenneko: …huh. Aight. So, um, yeah. That’s basically the basic idea. We’ll probably start rehearsing proper within the next few days. Until then, just kinda…hang out, I guess.

Ryota: Actually, where is Retsuko? Or Haida, for that matter?

Fenneko: They’re testing out wedding attire, for photos and stuff.

Rie: Can we go see them?

Tsunoda: Well, wait! What about the rest of the tour? I got stuff for the siblings!

Hiroko: …erm, does that include me, or just the twins?

Tsunoda: Both.

Fenneko: Tell ya what, I’ll just take the parents for a few minutes, to go see the lovebirds. We’ll be right back.

Tsunoda: Well, alright.

Ryota: Riko, keep an eye on your brother.

Riko: Yes, sir!

Hiroko: Ah, don’t worry! With me, he won’t be able to do much.

Ryuu: Murgh…

Fenneko: ….*to Tsunoda* lemme know if he acts up at all.

Tsunoda: Got it.

Fenneko: *to the parents* C’mon, let’s go. *they head out*

*a short while later, at a dressing room, in a clothing store nearby*

Retsuko: *getting dressed, with Haida and Ikari waiting outside* Good god, must these things always be so tight?!

Haida: Sorry, sweetie! You need help?

Retsuko: No, I think I got it.

Haida: You sure?

Retsuko: ….actually, I’m not sure.

Haida: Ah, alright. Lemme help. *gets up, and turns to see Fenneko with company* Oh! Hey, Fenneko! Hi, mom! Hi, dad!

Ryota: Heh, what, no hellos for us?

Retsuko: Oh, no, I’m not ready! Ugh, hang on!

Rie: …is she trying on a wedding dress?

Haida: Yyyyep.

Rie: *sigh* Hang on, sweetheart. Let me in. *Retsuko unlocks the door, and Rie sneaks in* …oh, you just have one last notch! Hang on….there! Ready, everyone?

Haida: Ready!

Ikari: Boh!

Retsuko: *sigh* Here goes. *they open the door, revealing Retsuko in a very lovely, pearly white dress, looking rather bashful*

Rie: *beaming with joy* What do you think, huh? :D

Haida: *his mouth agape: ………………..

Retsuko: …….Haida?

Fenneko: Yo, yeen boy. You alright?

Haida: ….*turns to Ryota* ..sir…..t-thank you so much! *to Rie* Thank you so much too! *bows to both*

Ryota: Uh…what for?

Haida: For allowing me to marry such an angel, of course! :’D

Retsuko: *face red like a tomato* H-Haida! >////<

Fenneko: Hahahaha, say whatever you will about Haida, he always knows how to get her flustered. :3

Retsuko: Hehehe! …hey, where are the others?

Fenneko: Tsunoda’s watching over Hiroko, Riko, and the ticking time-bomb.

Retsuko: Oh. How is Ryuu?

Ryota: Well, he seems to be calm right now. But I don’t know…

Retsuko: …well, maybe he just needs a little time to himself. Or maybe someone to chat with. We’ve all been a bit busy. *closes the door, to get undressed, and get back into her regular clothes*

Fenneko: My advice? Do it quickly, before he snaps on the big day. *her phone starts ringing* Ooh, Tsunoda! Gimme a sec, guys. *answers* Y’ello? ……………uh-huh…..uh-huh…….shit. Alright, hold him off for a few minutes. Alright, thanks. *hangs up* Okay, scratch that, your brother’s in meltdown mode right now.

Retsuko: *open the door, fully dressed in civilian attire* He’s WHAT?!

Fenneko: Yeah, he just started wrecking shit, apparently.

Rie: Oh, no! *they run out, to get going* Come on!

Haida: ….*quickly runs back to the cash register, with the wedding dress* this was paid for, right?

Cashier: Yes, sir, it was paid.

Haida: Wonderful.

Retsuko: HAIDA!

Haida: Coming! *runs out*

OHHHH, WE’RE HALFWAY THERE, WHOOOOOAAA, ….I CAN’T THINK OF A GOOD RHYME WITH THERE!

But yes, we are now OFFICIALLY at the halfway point! ….well, technically, we’re not, as there’s an epilo-actually, no, do NOT wanna jinx myself, ya know? I’m so sorry this has taken as long as it has, life has a weird way of kicking me in the balls when I least expect it. I don’t know when Part 5 will be, but I do know how it’ll go. So that’s a positive…..I think. :3

blog.name: mariellen-the-gelfling
blog.title: Mariellen
blog.description: I am a native of Thra. I have lost my wings. I have lost myself.

body: Good day.

reblog.comment: Good day.

trail.content_raw: Good day.
trail.content: Good day.
